title: Personal Finance Tracker
description: Manage your money effortlessly with our intuitive personal finance tracker app. Budget, track expenses, and achieve financial goals with ease.

title: Student Management System
description: This Student Management System streamlines tasks like student registration, attendance, grading, and performance tracking for educational institutions. It centralizes student data and improves efficiency in managing academic processes.

title: 2024_T20 World Cup Dashboard
description: Developed an interactive and dynamic dashboard to track and display scores, and key insights for the 2024 T20 World Cup.
